Articles.Content: Not operating on the same ground effect principals as the original, but still has the 8 front mounted engines, and stubby wing design, and land or takes off from water easily enough. Well, if you get the landing angle and velocities right of course...
I remember seeing a RL picture on the internet about this... care to put it on the OP for comparison? they look too alike!

some of these are NOT little, lol....

[http://bit.ly/KMpjLD](http://bit.ly/KMpjLD)

[http://bit.ly/KMpmHd](http://bit.ly/KMpmHd)

And I thought I was crazy...

I guess real life will always find ways to outdoo my imagination.
